attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A campaign has been established to support the case for a statue of Mahatma Gandhi in Belgrave, Leicester.  The petition is sponsored through community funds, and no public funds has or will be used in support of this cause.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Leicester/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
